Detailed Description

This abstract class is the basic MTree node. All classes that implement MTree nodes must extend this class.

The main function of this class is to provide a way to identify a disk node and create the required node instance to manipulate the node.

The structure of Index Node follows:

M node structure

The Header holds the information about the node itself.

  • Type: Type of this node. It may be stMNode::INDEX or stMNode::LEAF.
  • Occupation: Number of entries in this node.

The Node Data is the segment of the node which holds the particular information of each type of the node. This class does not know how this information is organized.

Author
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)
